com.miviclin.droidengine2d.graphics.shader

Class ShaderProgram

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.miviclin.droidengine2d.graphics.shader.ShaderProgram

  • public class ShaderProgram
extends java.lang.Object
    ShaderProgram contains a vertex shader and a fragment shader.
    Author:
    Miguel Vicente Linares

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ShaderProgram()
      Creates a ShaderProgram.

      Returns the location of the specified attribute in the shader.

      Returns a string containing the GLSL code of the fragment shader.

      Returns the location of the specified uniform in the shader.

      • isLinked

        public boolean isLinked()
        Returns true if the attributes of the shaders are linked to the program.
        Returns:
        true if the attributes of the shaders are linked to the program, false otherwise.

      • setShaders

        public void setShaders(java.lang.String vertexShaderSource,
              java.lang.String fragmentShaderSource,
              java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> attributes,
              java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> uniforms)
        Sets the vertex and fragment shaders of this program. This method should be called from compileAndLink() .
        Parameters:
        vertexShaderSource - GLSL code of the vertex shader.
        fragmentShaderSource - GLSL code of the fragment shader.
        attributes - List of attributes of the shader program.
        uniforms - List of uniforms of the shader program.

      • compileAndLink

        public void compileAndLink()
        1) Compiles the shaders, generating the ID of this program.
        2) Sets the ID of this program with setProgram(programId).
        3) Links the attributes of the shaders to this program and calls setLinked().

      • setAttribute

        public void setAttribute(java.lang.String attributeName,
                int size,
                int strideBytes,
                java.nio.FloatBuffer dataBuffer,
                int dataOffset)
        Sets the specified attribute's values for each vertex that will be sent to the vertex shader.
        Parameters:
        attributeName - Name of the attribute.
        size - Number of components of the specified vertex attribute (For example: position (x, y, z) => size=3).
        strideBytes - Byte offset between consecutive generic vertex attributes.
        dataBuffer - Buffer where vertices are stored.
        dataOffset - Offset of the first component of the first attribute with the specified attributeName in the dataBuffer.

      • setUniform1f

        public void setUniform1f(java.lang.String uniformName,
                float x)
        Specifies the value of the specified 1-component uniform of this shader program.
        Parameters:
        uniformName - Name of the uniform.
        x - Value of the uniform.

      • setUniform1fv

        public void setUniform1fv(java.lang.String uniformName,
                 int count,
                 float[] data,
                 int dataOffset)
        Specifies the value of the specified 1-component uniform array of this shader program.
        Parameters:
        uniformName - Name of the uniform.
        count - Number of elements of the uniform array.
        data - Array where the value of the uniform array is stored.
        dataOffset - Offset of the first element of the uniform in the specified array.

        Parameters:

        x - First component of the uniform.
        y - Second component of the uniform.

      • setUniformMatrix2fv

        public void setUniformMatrix2fv(java.lang.String uniformName,
                       int numMatrices,
                       float[] data,
                       int dataOffset)
        Specifies the value of the specified 2x2 matrix uniform of this shader program.
        Parameters:
        numMatrices - Number of matrices in the uniform array.
        data - Data of the matrices we want to send, in the same array.
        dataOffset - Offset of the first element of the first matrix.

      • setUniformMatrix3fv

        Parameters:
